pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Entropy Bootstrap for Time Series // Maximum entropy density based dependent data bootstrap. An algorithm is provided to create a population of time series (ensemble) without assuming stationarity. The reference paper (Vinod, H.D., 2004 DOI: 10.1016/j.jempfin.2003.06.002) explains how the algorithm satisfies the ergodic theorem and the central limit theorem.
